mapper.update: update tb_admin_menu set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent = #{parent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, route = #{route,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data = #{data,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, parent, route, order, data from tb_admin_menu
